text: Luigi Di Maio (; born 6 July 1986) is an Italian politician. He served as Vice President of the Chamber of Deputies. He was also the leader of the Five Star Movement, the anti-establishment party founded by Beppe Grillo between 2017 and 2020.Di Maio candidato premier M5S con quasi 31mila voti He ran for Prime Minister of Italy in the 2018 general election. In September 2017, Di Maio was elected the Prime Minister candidate and Political Head of the M5S, with more than 82% of votes.M5s, Di Maio eletto candidato premier e nuovo capo politico. Ma alle primarie votano solo in 37 mila Between 1 June 2018 to 5 September 2019, he was the Deputy Prime Minister of Italy. On 5 September 2019, Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte appointed him to be Minister of Foreign Affairs. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Campania
title: Luigi Di Maio
